attributes.action: build a tunnel between Northern Ireland and Mainland UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Building a tunnel under the Irish Sea has been considered in the past between several points in Northern Ireland, Scotland, The Irish Republic, Wales and England. We propose that a tunnel, similiar to the Channel Tunnel, be built for high speed trains somewhere between Northern Ireland and the Mainland for economic and environmental reasons.
